frame.name: Waking_up
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Sleeper</fen> transitions from a state of consciousness where they are largely unaware of their environment to a wakeful state.
<ex><fex name="Sleeper">William</fex> <t>awoke</t> <fex name="Sleep_state">from a dream</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the event occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the event occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Sleep_state
FE.definition: <def-root>This describes the state out of which the <fen>Sleeper</fen> awakens. <ex>He <t>awoke</t> <fex name="Sleep_state">out of a deep dream</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Depictive
FE.definition: <def-root>The state of the <fen>Sleeper</fen> upon waking up. <ex>Well, sometimes she just <t>wakes</t> <t>up</t> <fex name="Dep">angry</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: New_situation
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>New_situation</fen> is the situation the <fen>Sleeper</fen> finds him or herself in upon awaking. <ex>I <t>awoke</t> <fex name="New_situation">to the sound of the coffeegrinder</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root>Circumstances describe the state of the world (at a particular time and place) which is specifically independent of the event itself and any of its participants. </def-root>

FE.name: Particular_iteration
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE indicates an instance of the Waking_up event within an iterated series of similar events or states. </def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>The reason for which the <fen>Sleeper</fen> awakes from the <fen>Sleep_state</fen>. </def-root>

FE.name: Frequency
FE.definition: <def-root>This frame element is defined as the number of times an event occurs per some unit of time. </def-root>
